title: "Error: 404 Player not Found" when accessing Match History
body:
Hi All,
I understand that the Match History is in Beta but I have been attempting to view my matches and as soon as I scroll down to a point where it attempts to load more matches I get the following error. The entire page blanks out and I get the following text.
Error: 404
Player not found
The requested player was not found.
I have tested on multiple PC's using Chrome, Internet Explorer, Safari and Firefox but I get the error every time. I opened a support ticket in regards to this but was advised that it would be better if I posted it here. Is any one else having this issue?
I have also attached a screen shot of the issue.

replies.body:
>I opened a support ticket in regards to this but was advised that it would be better if I posted it here.

But we usually suggest that it's better to create a support ticket!

Anyway, I can shed some light on this. It's in beta. Simple as that. It's broken as hell.
Just found that I can search my summoner name and it works perfectly fine as intended. This is a possible work around for those having issues with their match history.

Same issue here - waiting to see if i get a reply from support

~you are not alone~

I just found that if I search my summoner name there is no issue at all... :/ but if I go to it from my summoner profile the issue occurs... Might be a possible work around if you are having the same issue.
